name: Taj Mahal
description: Iconic 17th-century white marble mausoleum in Agra. A symbol of love and Indian culture.

name: Marine Drive
description: Scenic coastal road in Mumbai great for evening walks.

description: Historic monument and mosque in Hyderabad.

description: A beautiful hill station with snowy mountains.
